headline: Newmont Challenges Barrick Over Nevada Gold Mines IPO And Valuation
summary: Newmont (NYSE:NEM) is pressing Barrick to improve operations and management at their Nevada Gold Mines joint venture. The company is also asserting its rights that could potentially block Barrick's planned IPO of the Nevada Gold Mines assets. This move raises questions about the timeline and structure of any future public offering tied to the joint venture. Newmont is one of the largest gold producers globally, and Nevada Gold Mines is a key joint venture in a sector where asset quality,...

headline: CIBC Raises its Price Target on Newmont Corporation (NEM) to $177 and Reiterates an Outperformer Rating
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is included among the 10 Most Profitable Undervalued Stocks to Buy On February 4, 2026, CIBC raised its price target on Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) to $177 from $112 and reiterated an Outperformer rating.
